test_vectors.name: consensus_block_valid_dag
test_vectors.description: Valid block with DAG tips is accepted

test_vectors.name: consensus_block_invalid_no_tips
test_vectors.description: Block with no tips (except genesis) is rejected

test_vectors.name: consensus_block_invalid_tips_count
test_vectors.description: Block with more than TIPS_LIMIT tips is rejected

test_vectors.name: consensus_block_invalid_tip_not_found
test_vectors.description: Block with unknown tip is rejected

test_vectors.name: consensus_block_invalid_height
test_vectors.description: Block with height not matching tips is rejected

test_vectors.name: consensus_block_invalid_height_stable
test_vectors.description: Block with height in stable range is rejected

test_vectors.name: consensus_block_invalid_timestamp_future
test_vectors.description: Block with timestamp >2 seconds in future is rejected

test_vectors.name: consensus_block_invalid_timestamp_past
test_vectors.description: Block with timestamp less than parent is rejected

test_vectors.name: consensus_block_invalid_difficulty
test_vectors.description: Block with invalid proof-of-work difficulty is rejected

test_vectors.name: consensus_block_invalid_tips_difficulty
test_vectors.description: Block must reference tips with highest cumulative difficulty

test_vectors.name: consensus_nonce_sequential
test_vectors.description: Transactions in block must have sequential nonces per sender

test_vectors.name: consensus_nonce_gap_rejected
test_vectors.description: Transaction with nonce gap is orphaned

test_vectors.name: consensus_block_version
test_vectors.description: Block version must be valid for current height
